function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Constant changes in the environment leading to the need for adaptive architecture","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases spread due to frequent changes in building design","Mitigation":"Implementing flexible and modular building design to accommodate changing requirements","Technologies":"Modular construction, adaptive building materials","People":"Building designers, architects, urban planners","Owner":"Building design and construction firms"},{"Description":"Integration of functional and technical solutions to achieve transformable design","Impact":"Inadequate consideration of disease transmission routes in the design process","Mitigation":"Incorporating health and hygiene guidelines into design decisions, consulting with public health experts","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, touchless interfaces, antimicrobial materials","People":"Design decision-makers, architects, public health experts","Owner":"Architectural firms, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Changes in building after construction requiring adaptability","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission due to unanticipated changes impacting building functionality","Mitigation":"Conducting post-construction assessments to identify and address potential disease transmission risks","Technologies":"Retrofitting with improved ventilation systems, implementing infection control measures","People":"Architects, building maintenance staff, public health inspectors","Owner":"Building owners, facilities management teams"}]}
